about_the_game:
This is an EXCLUSIVE Limted Time Offer to buy your Nerm a wearable ball cap while you play the game! Once you buy this exclusive very limited time DLC, you'll be able to put a ball cap of 8 different colors on Nerm for your game! The ball cap option will last forever once purchased and you can choose a different call cap color every time you play the game!



Nerm likes hats. Nerm knows "what's up" and "how to look cool"! You know you want to play the coolest Nerm possible so treat him to this early Christmas present NOW before it goes away forever!

This Nerm the Worm exclusive ball cap will only be available for the first 500 purchasers and they could go fast, so be sure you buy your "Nermie" a ball cap now!
